Package edu.ncsu.csc.CoffeeMaker.controllers

Class MappingController

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.ncsu.csc.CoffeeMaker.controllers.MappingController
  • @Controller
public class MappingController
extends java.lang.Object
    Controller class for the URL mappings for CoffeeMaker. The controller returns the approprate HTML page in the /src/main/resources/templates folder. For a larger application, this should be split across multiple controllers.
    Author:
    Kai Presler-Marshall

      • inventoryForm

        @GetMapping({"/inventory","/inventory.html"})
public java.lang.String inventoryForm​(org.springframework.ui.Model model)
        Handles a GET request for inventory. The GET request provides a view to the client that includes the list of the current ingredients in the inventory and a form where the client can enter more ingredients to add to the inventory.
        Parameters:
        model - underlying UI model
        Returns:
        contents of the page
